item.description:
We will be having an informal discussion on plans for 2008,

- lets get to know each other
- discuss how to fundraise for future events and retire Boston Tea Party expenses
- discuss how to support cross movement activities (impeachment and antiwar)
- brainstorming for future actions

See you there!
item.how_to_find_us: If you don't already know me, I'll be decked out in 911 buttons, and wearing a black coat. I'll arrive earlier to scope out tables for us. If there is not enough room we will go to some place nearby. If this location doesn't work for you email me!
item.why: Learn about 9/11 Truth and join the action!

group.name: We Are Change Boston / Boston 9/11 Truth

item.name: Boston 9/11 Truth Meet-up
